title: Roads, Crashes, and Substances: A Geocoded Atlas of Western US Traffic FatalitiesThis paper is a revision of APEP-0103. See https://github.com/anthropics/auto-policy-evals/tree/main/papers/apep_0103 for the original. (v2)
revision_rationale: Fix missing years (2006-2015), fix THC data pipeline bugs, polish paper
